effect.x_y: Inflicts regular damage. If a weather move is active, this move has double power, and its type becomes the type of the weather move. shadow sky is typeless for the purposes of this move.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Inflicts regular damage. If a weather move is active, this move has double power, and its type becomes the type of the weather move. shadow sky is typeless for the purposes of this move.

short_effect.x_y: If there be weather, this move has doubled power and the weather’s type.
short_effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: If there be weather, this move has doubled power and the weather’s type.

flavor_text.x_y: An attack move that varies in power and type depending on the weather.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: An attack move that varies in power and type depending on the weather.
